alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, southeastern DeKalb and south central Gwinnett Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lakeview Estates, or near Conyers. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Snellville, Lithonia, Lakeview Estates, Georgia International Horse Park, Milstead, Belmont, Arabia Mountain, Big Haynes Creek Park, Redan and Rosebud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
